ABOUT ME

About two years ago, I decided to try myself as a Frontend Developer. I like to solve unusual tasks, I easily find a common language with new people, for me the main goal is self-improvement, it is important to become and know that you are better than yesterday. My hobbies: read books, go in for sports, try Photoshop, play games and learn to develop games. At the moment I am looking for a company that can show that I am capable of much.My qualities such as: sociability, learnability and observation make me good at teamwork. Also I have a thirst for knowledge in Frontend sphere.
